title: 500 shows strong
body:
Today's 4:30 showing of PULSE was our 500th official show, and, like an idiot, I completely forgot to mention it during the introdution. Now none of those people will realize that they were a part of Moxie history, and that their names will be taught in history classes years from now.

On a side note, I was asked the classic "if a tree falls in the forest, and no one is around, does it make a sound?" question earlier today. My answer: "Yes, it makes a sound, but it can only be heard by either Chuck Norris or Werner Herzog; depending on which one isn't being shot at that particular moment." Just thought I'd mention that.

500 shows! Woo hoo! We're AWESOME!
author: Dan

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Gah. There are 3 we can't get. 8, 9, and 24. They're probably really easy.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body:
Ha! When you figure out #8 (if you do) the next thing you need to do is RENT THAT MOVIE cause it's GREAT! #9 was the one I didn't get. I have NO clue. #24 is a cult classic from not long ago, but that's all I'm saying.

The Moxie should have a contest like this. Except make them a little harder and make a lot of them from movies you've shown and indie classics. No big studio ones that are obvious like Mensa did.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Haha...was that one of those AskforCents questions? Congrats on the 500 shows. By the way, there is a great Google ad on here right now advertising "Springfield MO Hairstyles." That's funny on more than one level. But I'm sure you all can figure that all out for yourselves.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body:
Mensa has a new movie screenshot quiz. I got all but one. Check it out:

http://www.funwithmovies.com/
